Package ohos.agp.components.webengine

Interface WebRequestAccess


  • public interface WebRequestAccess
    Provides access requests from web content.
    Since:
    7

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String ACCESS_CAMERA
      Allows a web content to use the camera.
      static String ACCESS_MICROPHONE
      Allows a web content to use the microphone.
      static String ACCESS_MIDI_PRIVILEGED_MESSAGES
      Allows a web content to send or receive privileged operation messages to MIDI devices.
      static String ACCESS_PROTECTED_MEDIA_IDENTIFIER
      Allows a web content access to protected media identifiers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void denyAccess​()
      Deny access requested by WebView.
      String[] getWebContentAccess​()
      Obtains access for Web Page Requests.
      Uri getWebContentOrigin​()
      Obtains the Uri of the web page which is access is being requested.
      void grantAccess​(String[] access)
      Grant the access specified by WebView.
